name: Destroy the LizardGuys
description:
Destroy random dudes to hit the score and beat your record.

This project is being developed as a open source in Godot Engine. Here's the source code: https://github.com/Hairic95/Destroy-the-Lizard-Guys

Right now it is really basic and the code is pretty messy but feel free to use this code or to suggest ways to write it better. Hopefully it can be useful to you.

I'll also make some tutorial video in the near future so stay tuned for them ;)
